alert.note: Alert for Flathead National Forest, Glacier Park, Bob Marshall And Mission Mountain Wilderness; Salish and Kootenai Indian Reservation (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 24 at 9:05PM MDT until July 25 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * Affected area: Fire Zone 105 (Flathead/Glacier Park). Fire Zone 107 (Flathead Reservation). * Impacts: The combination of gusty winds, low humidity, and threat for isolated dry thunderstorms will continue through this evening resulting in critical fire weather conditions. * Winds: West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * Minimum humidities: 10 to 20 percent. &&

area.areaDesc: Flathead National Forest, Glacier Park, Bob Marshall And Mission Mountain Wilderness; Salish and Kootenai Indian Reservation
